title: The Weight Of Glory | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Weight Of Glory | Joel Osteen
description:
What God has in store for you is greater than anything you can imagine. If you’ll trust Him, He will use everything you've been through to prepare you for the weight that comes with new levels of favor.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
